alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 03 at 9:15AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * TIMING...From Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
